```{r guskey-framework, echo = F}
library(bs4cards)
time_diff <- Sys.Date() - as.Date("2019-01-01")
year_diff <- round(as.numeric(time_diff) / 365)
galleries3 <- tibble::tibble(
  long_name = c(
    "Blog 1: Changing the Game: How High-Dosage Coaching Shifts Teacher Practices & Student Success"
  ),
  blurb = c(
    "Discover how Teaching Lab's innovative coaching is transforming classrooms by uplifting both teachers and students."
  ),
  image_url = c(
    here::here("Images/blog/blog_header.png")
  ),
  link = c(
    "https://teachinglab.github.io/blog_post_1.html"
  )
)

galleries3 |>
  cards(
    title = long_name,
    text = blurb,
    link = link,
    image = image_url,
    layout = "label-below",
    width = 2,
    spacing = 3
  )
```
